messages.content: Hi there! Thanks for calling EZ Mobile Mechanic. What seems to be going on with your vehicle?
my front brakes are bad  my front brakes the long delay long delay um
Got it! Can I get the year, make, and model of your vehicle?
very beginning  if I was a customer I might hang up
I understand, thanks for the feedback! Let's get this sorted out. Can you tell me the year, make, and model of your vehicle?
Sounds good! Just let me know the year, make, and model when you're ready.
Great, a 2020 Ford Fiesta! So, you mentioned the front brakes are having a long delay. Is there anything else going on with the vehicle?
Got it, 2020 Ford Fiesta with front brake issues. Would you like me to text you a quick estimate?
fuck oops  sorry take it back
No problem at all! Just to confirm, you still want the estimate for the brakes on your 2020 Ford Fiesta?
yes I need that estimate if I could get it verbally that would be great
I can definitely get you an estimate via text, and then the mechanic will follow up with you. Does that work for you?
I mean I would really like to get it verbally right now but I can wait for the mechanic if that's what I need to do
I understand! Unfortunately, I can't provide a verbal estimate right now, but I can send you a quick text, and the mechanic will follow up with you shortly. Does that sound good?
